metadata.title: CVE-2019-8376 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Tcpreplay 4.3.1. A NULL pointer dereference occurred in the function get_layer4_v6() located at get.c. This can be triggered by sending a crafted pcap file to the tcpreplay-edit binary. It allows an attacker to cause a Denial of Service (Segmentation fault) or possibly have unspecified other impact.

criterions.comment: tcpreplay package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.3.1-2').
